title: Today I am a big-time type designer dude!
content:
Hey, it's been a while.   
   
Today I saw that this site, [http://www.skycaptain.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221931/http:/www.skycaptain.com/)  
which happens to be my most anticipated movie of the year,   
was updated with all kinds of cool stuff, and in particular most   
of the site is now using the font Futurex Phat, that I designed   
and put into the public domain several years ago as part of the   
Futurex project!   
see: [http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=180](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021221931/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=180)   
   
Yeah, I'm sure some of you actually get paid to do fonts for   
movies, but this is my little time to shine! :D   
   
Take care!
author: objekt

comments.content:
Thanks. I'm now inspired to give away more of my fonts. :-)   
   
Umm...I'll get back to you all on that.

yeah, big up!   
It's doubly nice if it's a movie you like.
Yeah really, way to go. I was stoked to see my free stomper font on the packaging for the movie Exit Wounds. The movie was a so-so action flick, but any exposure is good exposure.
And it must be a doubly stoked feeling to know that your hard work added value to a commercial product that you received absolutely no financial compensation for!
